sys_openapi_operation.name: Get issues for sprint
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Get issues for sprint","fOperationId":"getIssuesForSprint","fDescription":"Returns all issues in a sprint, for a given sprint ID. This only includes issues that the user has permission to view. By default, the returned issues are ordered by rank. ","fPath":"/agile/1.0/sprint/{sprintId}/issue","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"Returns the requested issues, at the specified page of the results.","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json"}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"401","fDescription":"Returned if the user is not logged in.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"403","fDescription":"Returned if the user does not a have valid license.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"Returned if sprint does not exist or the user cannot view it.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"sprintId","fDescription":"The ID of the sprint that contains the requested issues.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"sprintId3181629447","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"int64","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"}}]},{"fName":"startAt","fDescription":"The starting index of the returned issues.
